chunk: Leek and potato recipe A classic winter warmer, mashed potato mixed with tasty leeks. Age: 6 months or older Prep: 10 mins Cook: 15 mins Portions: 10 (approx) Ingredients - 1 medium potato, peeled and chopped - 1 leek, washed and finely diced - 2 tbsp full-fat milk or baby's usual milk Method Bring a pan of water to the boil and add the potato. Cook for 10 minutes. Dice the leek and add to the pan, cook for another 5 minutes. Once the vegetables are soft, drain, then add milk and mash until smooth. If the mixture is still too thick, add a little more full-fat milk or baby's usual milk. Cool down before serving. Information: Mix a teaspoon of unsalted butter into the potato while mashing for a creamier texture. Weaning tip Remember, babies do not need salt or sugar added to their food (or cooking water).
title: Leek And Potato
description: A classic winter warmer, mashed potato mixed with tasty leeks.
ingredients: 2 tbsp full-fat milk or baby's usual milk
